modShortDescription: A christmas mod for 7 Days to Die. Includes snowmen, candy canes, christmas presents, christmas socks, christmas tree and christmas lights.
modDescription:
Hernanxx made a quick 7 Days to Die mod for those who like Christmas. Go and give that [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombie-mods/) wasteland world that is 7DTD world some good old Christmas spirit by decorating your base as if there was still any hope to come back to what it was before. Have a hohoho Christmas, until Santa’s comes, and takes your soul.

We have snowmen, or as we are in 2019, snowpersons or snowpeople or whatever.

There are some pointless giant candy canes.

Presents! Presents for everybody, but in that world you probably shouldn’t expect anything better than an expired cat [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/food-mods/) can.

Christmas socks, mostly to remain empty.

And of course we have a Christmas tree. And there are some lights.

And for those who still have some fuel left for those generators! Christmas [lights](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-lights/)!

Hernanxx modeled and textured this himself. He hope you like it.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/open?id=14Knt2fxMFVPJdFbdkq5DStI9buT8ynHf)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16747-hn-christmas-mod/).

**Credits:** hernanxx
